new.name: test_iconv
new.description: This repository contains a C program to test for CVE-2024-2961, a buffer overflow vulnerability in the iconv() function of glibc.

new.name: iconvfix
new.description: Bash script to patch for CVE-2024-2961

new.name: cnext-exploits
new.description: Exploits for CNEXT (CVE-2024-2961), a buffer overflow in the glibc's iconv()
